title: Queen Helene Mint Julep Masque, 8 Ounce
description: The Original Mint Julep MasqueHelps dry up acne pimplesRinses away blackheadsHelps shrink large poresThe original natural home treatment, developed by a dermatologist, that will actually dry up acne pimples, rinse away blackheads and even help shrink enlarged pores.Simply apply Mint Julep Masque to your face and neck.  Within minutes it firms and hardens, as its suction action draws out waste matter from the pores.  Minutes later, rinse the masque away with warm water and a washcloth.  After the masque is removed your  skin will feel clean...refreshed and smooth.Even for people who are fortunately free of skin problems, Mint Julep Masque is a refreshing facial treatment that relaxes tired muscles and eases tension lines on the face and neck.No animal testing.  No animal ingredients.Queen Helene.  Environmentally Concerned.Made in USA

title: Freeman Cucumber Facial Peel-Off Mask - 6 oz
description: Clarifies and Renews SkinMade with natural, botanical ingredients, new Freeman Feeling Beautiful is a full range of skin and body care products to help you look and feel your best. This clarifying mask gently peels away impurities while Cucumber extract leaves your skin smooth and silky.Made in USA
